projectPurpose: To provide an open-source, user-centric, and highly customizable web search engine with a focus on respecting user queries, privacy, and transparency, offering an alternative to mainstream search engines.
mainFeatures: Fully independent search index with its own crawler

alternatives.name: Google Search
mainFeatures: Vast range of integrated services (Maps, Shopping, News, Images, Videos)

alternatives.name: Bing
mainFeatures: Web, image, video, news, and map search

alternatives.name: DuckDuckGo
alternatives.license: Mixed (Core Proprietary, some components Open Source - Apache 2.0, Creative Commons)

alternatives.name: Brave Search
alternatives.license: Mixed (Some components Open Source - MIT, part of Brave Browser - MPL)
platforms: Integrated into Brave Browser (Windows, macOS, Linux, Android, iOS)

alternatives.name: Startpage
mainFeatures: Provides Google search results with privacy protection
No IP address recording or tracking cookies

alternatives.name: Ecosia
mainFeatures: Uses search ad revenue to plant trees

alternatives.name: SearXNG
mainFeatures: Metasearch engine (aggregates results from multiple sources)

marketPositioning: Stract is positioned as an open-source, independent, and highly customizable alternative web search engine for users, particularly tinkerers and developers, who seek greater control and transparency over their search experience. Unlike many privacy-focused alternatives that rely on major engines, Stract boasts its own independent index and crawler. Its unique 'optics' feature allows for deep personalization of results, differentiating it from the less customizable nature of mainstream search engines and even many privacy-focused options. It directly challenges the dominance of proprietary search by offering a fully open and controllable platform focused on respecting user intent and privacy.
